name: tweezer.js
description: A simple utility to easily create performant tweening.
author: @jaxgeller

scripts.build: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s Tweezer -o dist/tweezer.js src/tweezer.js
scripts.release: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify  -s Tweezer -o dist/tweezer.min.js src/tweezer.js
